originalText.text: The whole Vickers team is incredibly helpful. I was in a bit of a jam to move in quickly and Michael allowed me to move my things in a few days before my lease agreement started at no extra cost. Super helpful, responsive, and caring group to work with! Definitely people you can trust in a daunting space of NYC real estate.

originalText.text: Vickers Realty is an excellent Management company to rent apartments from. I leased at 3 Clinton street and it was absolutely delightful! Communication is great and if you ever need something fixed or looked at they come right away! Highly recommend renting from Vickers Realty.

text.text: Vickers Realty is an excellent Management company to rent apartments from. I leased at 3 Clinton street and it was absolutely delightful! Communication is great and if you ever need something fixed or looked at they come right away! Highly recommend renting from Vickers Realty.

originalText.text: My girlfriend and I have been living in our downtown apartment for about half a year now and we are incredibly happy with the management team and our super Rini. Every request we have put in has been taken care of within a few days, if not the same day.  We were also happy with the lease signing process - Michael was professional, helpful, and welcoming.

originalText.text: Vickers is fantastic! They take care of the property, the super is great. Always deal with requests immediately. Best management company we have ever dealt with.
